data: Upon one of those hot, sultry summer afternoons that so often prevail about the banks of the Bosphorus, the sun was fast sinking towards its western course, and gilding as it went, the golden crescents of a thousand minarets, now dancing with fairy feet over the rippling waters of Marmora, now dallying with the spray of the oarsmenâ€™s blades, as they pulled the gilded caique of some rich old Mussulman up the tide of the Golden Horn.

Upon one of those hot, sultry summer afternoons that so often prevail about the banks of the Bosphorus, the sun was fast sinking towards its western course, and gilding as it went, the golden crescents of a thousand minarets, now dancing with fairy feet over the rippling waters of Marmora, now dallying with the spray of the oarsmen's blades, as they pulled the gilded caique of some rich old Mussulman up the tide of the Golden Horn.
The Circassian Slave, or, the Sultan's favorite : a story of Constantinople and the Caucasus
browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: historical novels|category: romance|category: adventure
